1.panel_description: Display the top 30 vacation spots in Europe.

1.handles: Retrieves a list of top 30 vacation destinations in Europe

input_vars.name: query_vacation_spots
input_vars.description: Query to get the top 30 vacation spots in Europe
input_vars.value: What are the top 30 vacation spots in Europe?

output_vars.name: vacation_spots_list
output_vars.description: List of top 30 vacation spots in Europe
output_vars.value:
[
      "Venice, Italy",
